pages.title: Just Breathe
pages.text: Now that you've got $(item)Niobium$() you can use it to help protect yourself from the corrosion of the mist. Firstly, use it to make a pickaxe, which can cleave through the $(item)Foggy Stone$() with ease, and has the finesse to collect other Misty ores. Of those the most important is $(item)Filter Coal$() which, when placed in a $(item)Respirator$(), allows one to safely breathe in the $(thing)Mist$().
Can be equipped as a helmet, or in a unique slot accessed by clicking directly above the helmet slot in your inventory.$(br2)Hold in your hand and right click to add $(item)Filter Coal$().
